tool.name: anvi-script-variability-to-vcf
tool.description: A script to convert SNV output obtained from anvi-gen-variability-profile to the standard VCF format

param.name: input
param.label: Input
param.help: Filepath to the SNV table. This is the output from the anvi-gen-variability-profile program with the nucleotide engine (which is the default engine).

tool.help:
usage: anvi-script-variability-to-vcf [-h] [-i FILE_PATH] [-o FILE_PATH]
A script to convert SNV output obtained from anvi-gen-variability-profile to the standard VCF format
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -i FILE_PATH, --input FILE_PATH Filepath to the SNV table. This is the output from the anvi-gen-variability-profile program with the nucleotide engine (which is the default engine). -o FILE_PATH, --output-file FILE_PATH File path to store results.
